note.p: Career: Secretary to various Lords Chamberlains of the Household (1689-1699, 1700-1714); Commissioner of Stamp Duties (1698-1700); Commissioner of Customs (1708-death); MP in the Irish Parliament for Newborough (1713-1714)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; GEC Baronetage; Hunter
References: Sir John Craig, 'The Royal Society and the Royal Mint' in NR 1964 vol 19 pp 156-167
